overview: Mike Carter is an entrepreneur who has focused on founding, building, and selling companies for more than 20 years. A graduate of Northwesternâ€™s Kellogg School of Management and a CPA who began his career at Arthur Andersen, he has extensive experience in finance and management. From public accounting, Carter helped found Network Multifamily Security, Inc, a home security company. His role in securing lines of credit from Citicorp and others ultimately led to Networkâ€™s sale through an IPO. Carter remained in the multi-family security industry with the founding of Advanced Protection Systems, Inc. APS grew into the second largest company in its industry with operations in 27 states and over 380 employees. APS sold to Centex Corporation, a Fortune 200 company. Prior to joining Tang Energy Group, Carter was a consultant providing litigation support and valuation services to large corporate clients.
